scripts.install:all: yarn install && yarn --cwd functions install && flutter pub get
scripts.build:functions: yarn --cwd functions lint && yarn --cwd functions build
scripts.test: yarn build:functions && firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore,storage "yarn --cwd functions test"
scripts.start: yarn build:functions && firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore,storage --ui "yarn test:data && flutter run -d chrome --web-port 5000"
